overview.description: JCL IBM allows precise control over job execution steps, dataset management, and resource allocation, ensuring efficient and organized batch processing.

step_list.description: Dummy program for dataset allocation or deletion
step_list.property: PREDEL step uses the IEFBR14 program to allocate or delete the dataset 'FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.USRSEC.PS' with specified DISP and SPACE parameters.

step_list.description: Copies records from a sequential dataset

dd_statement.logic:
ADMIN001MARGARET            GOLD                PASSWORDA
ADMIN002RUSSELL             RUSSELL             PASSWORDA
ADMIN003RAYMOND             WHITMORE            PASSWORDA
ADMIN004EMMANUEL            CASGRAIN            PASSWORDA
ADMIN005GRANVILLE           LACHAPELLE          PASSWORDA
USER0001LAWRENCE            THOMAS              PASSWORDU
USER0002AJITH               KUMAR               PASSWORDU
USER0003LAURITZ             ALME                PASSWORDU
USER0004AVERARDO            MAZZI               PASSWORDU
USER0005LEE                 TING                PASSWORDU

step_list.property: JCL for STEP01 uses IEBGENER to copy records from a sequential dataset to a new dataset with specified attributes.

dd_statement.logic:
DELETE                  FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.USRSEC.VSAM.KSDS
 SET       MAXCC = 0
 DEFINE    CLUSTER (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.USRSEC.VSAM.KSDS)    -
                    KEYS(8,0)                                 -
                    RECORDSIZE(80,80)                         -
                    REUSE                                     -
                    INDEXED                                   -
                    VOLUMES(USER04)                           -
                    TRACKS(45,15)                             -
                    FREESPACE(10,15)                          -
                    CISZ(8192))                               -
           DATA    (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.USRSEC.VSAM.KSDS.DAT)) -
           INDEX   (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.USRSEC.VSAM.KSDS.IDX))

step_list.property: JCL allows you to define and execute steps like STEP03 with IDCAMS to perform dataset operations using detailed DD statements and parameters.
